sentences.simplifiedText: 父母不许我晚上出去玩。
sentences.traditionalText: 父母不准我晚上出去玩。
sentences.pinyin: Fùmǔ bùxǔ wǒ wǎnshàng chūqù wán.
sentences.translation: My parents did not allow me to go out to play at night.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由於工作過於緊張，醫生不许她近期內再工作。
sentences.traditionalText: 由于工作过于紧张，医生不许她近期内再工作。
sentences.pinyin: Yóuyú gōngzuò guòyú jǐnzhāng, yīshēng bùxǔ tā jìnqī nèi zài gōngzuò.
sentences.translation: Because her work was too strenuous, the doctor did not allow her to work again in the near term.
I won't allow you to go.

sentences.simplifiedText: 如果你不能按时完成你的工作，我不许你去参加那个派对。
sentences.traditionalText: 如果你不能按時完成你的工作，我不許你去參加那個派對。
sentences.pinyin: Rúguǒ nǐ bùnéng ànshí wánchéng nǐ de gōngzuò, wǒ bùxǔ nǐ qù cānjiā nàgè pàiduì.
sentences.translation: If you can't finish your work on time, I won't allow you to go to that party.
